short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy-to-use extension for quick SEO analysis. Check metadata, headings, links, manipulate REGEX, and export results to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple SEO Analysis Tool - Ferramenta de SEO

With this extension, you can perform various page-level analyses, quickly identifying SEO issues and opportunities. üîé

You can ensure your pages are SEO-optimized, facilitate data analysis, and enhance the user experience on your site, all in one place! üìà

Time Saver: The extension simplifies routine tasks, such as reviewing SEO elements, auditing links and headings, and verifying Google Analytics implementation, saving time for SEOs, developers, and content professionals.

*** FEATURES ***
--------------------------------

1. SEO OVERVIEW: This feature allows you to quickly view the key SEO information of any web page, including the page title, description, URL, number of internal and external links, robot metadata, language, word count, and more.

Usage Tips:

‚úÖ On-Page SEO Check: Use the overview to ensure your pages are optimized for SEO.

‚úÖ Content Monitoring: The tool helps you check word counts and headings (H1, H2, H3, etc.), assisting in reviewing title hierarchy to improve readability and SEO.

‚úÖ Competitor Analysis: Analyze competitor pages by checking their topic structure and last update date.

--------------------------------

2. LINKS FINDER: This feature allows you to locate and list all internal and external links on a specific page. It also enables searching for links based on specific terms or URLs, returning all corresponding links.

Usage Tips:

‚úÖ Identify Relevant Links: Use this feature to find links pointing to specific URLs or check links containing important terms.

‚úÖ Link Management: Great for auditing a page's links. Quickly see which are internal or external, and identify anchor cannibalization.

‚úÖ Opportunities: Check where other sites are linking and whether any point to your site. Find new opportunities.

--------------------------------

3. HEADINGS EXTRACTOR: With this tool, you can identify and extract all heading tags (H1, H2, H3, etc.) from a web page. This helps review the structure of titles and subtitles, essential for good readability and structured SEO.

Usage Tips:

‚úÖ Analyze Title Hierarchy: By checking heading tags, you can ensure that your pages follow a logical, easy-to-read structure, which is key to optimizing user experience.

‚úÖ Technical SEO Review: The tool helps identify whether a page contains a correct hierarchy of H1, H2, and other headings, fundamental for SEO optimization.

‚úÖ Topic Comparison: Extract the topic structure from several pages and easily compare which page offers more complete coverage. Use this to plan optimization and better content.

--------------------------------

4. REGEX GENERATOR: This feature generates regular expressions (Regex) based on a list of words or URLs provided by the user. You can choose between four pattern types: contains, exact match, starts with, and ends with. There is also an option to remove the base URL, keeping only the slug to minimize the number of characters in the result.

Usage Tips:

‚úÖ Filtering Automation: Use the Regex generator to quickly create patterns that make it easier to filter URLs or specific keywords in large databases.

‚úÖ Web Analytics Tools: The generated Regex can be applied in tools like Google Search Console or Google Analytics to monitor specific URLs or traffic patterns.

‚úÖ Performance Tracking: A data analyst can use the generator to create URL filters containing specific keywords like "/blog" or "/products," allowing for segmented analysis.

--------------------------------

5. GA4 CHECKER (Beta): This feature quickly checks whether a web page has Google Analytics 4 (GA4) installed, and if available, displays the associated Measurement ID.

Usage Tips:

‚úÖ GA4 Implementation Audit: Use the checker to ensure that all your pages have the GA4 code correctly installed, essential for tracking traffic and conversions.

‚úÖ Troubleshooting: If you suspect a page isn‚Äôt sending data to GA4, this tool helps identify if the code is missing or incorrect.
